        public HighlightBuilder.Field(String name)

    • Method Detail

      • name

        public String name()

      • preTags

        public HighlightBuilder.Field preTags(String... preTags)
        Explicitly set the pre tags for this field that will be used for highlighting. This overrides global settings set by HighlightBuilder.preTags(String...).

      • postTags

        public HighlightBuilder.Field postTags(String... postTags)
        Explicitly set the post tags for this field that will be used for highlighting. This overrides global settings set by HighlightBuilder.postTags(String...).

      • fragmentSize

        public HighlightBuilder.Field fragmentSize(int fragmentSize)

      • fragmentOffset

        public HighlightBuilder.Field fragmentOffset(int fragmentOffset)

      • numOfFragments

        public HighlightBuilder.Field numOfFragments(int numOfFragments)

      • highlightFilter

        public HighlightBuilder.Field highlightFilter(boolean highlightFilter)

      • order

        public HighlightBuilder.Field order(String order)
        The order of fragments per field. By default, ordered by the order in the highlighted text. Can be score, which then it will be ordered by score of the fragments. This overrides global settings set by HighlightBuilder.order(String).

      • requireFieldMatch

        public HighlightBuilder.Field requireFieldMatch(boolean requireFieldMatch)

      • boundaryMaxScan

        public HighlightBuilder.Field boundaryMaxScan(int boundaryMaxScan)

      • boundaryChars

        public HighlightBuilder.Field boundaryChars(char[] boundaryChars)

      • highlighterType

        public HighlightBuilder.Field highlighterType(String highlighterType)
        Set type of highlighter to use. Supported types are highlighter, fast-vector-highlighter nad postings-highlighter. This overrides global settings set by HighlightBuilder.highlighterType(String).

      • fragmenter

        public HighlightBuilder.Field fragmenter(String fragmenter)
        Sets what fragmenter to use to break up text that is eligible for highlighting. This option is only applicable when using plain / normal highlighter. This overrides global settings set by HighlightBuilder.fragmenter(String).

      • highlightQuery

        public HighlightBuilder.Field highlightQuery(QueryBuilder highlightQuery)
        Sets a query to use for highlighting this field instead of the search query.

      • noMatchSize

        public HighlightBuilder.Field noMatchSize(Integer noMatchSize)
        Sets the size of the fragment to return from the beginning of the field if there are no matches to highlight.
        Parameters:
        noMatchSize - integer to set or null to leave out of request. default is null.
        Returns:
        this for chaining

      • options

        public HighlightBuilder.Field options(Map<String,Object> options)
        Allows to set custom options for custom highlighters. This overrides global settings set by HighlightBuilder#options(Map).

      • matchedFields

        public HighlightBuilder.Field matchedFields(String... matchedFields)
        Set the matched fields to highlight against this field data. Default to null, meaning just the named field. If you provide a list of fields here then don't forget to include name as it is not automatically included.

      • phraseLimit

        public HighlightBuilder.Field phraseLimit(Integer phraseLimit)
        Sets the maximum number of phrases the fvh will consider.
        Parameters:
        phraseLimit - maximum number of phrases the fvh will consider
        Returns:
        this for chaining

      • forceSource

        public HighlightBuilder.Field forceSource(boolean forceSource)
        Forces the highlighting to highlight this field based on the source even if this field is stored separately.
